channel.title: 2010-2011 RS Highscores
channel.description:
this was made entirely by me (meaning, i downloaded everything individually, edited each webpage and added the php to include the different pages via $_get)
this php code is probably extremely horrible/vulnerable. i just wanted to do it in a single file, rather than multiple files like most highscores do.
this is not a finished project, and will not be finished by me. i don't have the patience or knowledge to do so.
the code is all bad, but i feel as though i did good for a learning experience (this has been on my hdd for a long time - i started making it before the pages were updated fully (when the homepage was first updated in 2011))
notice the url and you'll see how i did it (i probably should have done some sort of template system to include the requested page, but no. i used a million if statements)
please do not criticize the code, as i know it sucks. i just feel as thought someone may be able to fix/recreate it, or just find some use into the styling/images.
http://i49.tinypic.com/2agkie8.jpg http://i47.tinypic.com/1qhe7p.jpg http://i49.tinypic.com/16k2fbk.jpg http://i48.tinypic.com/34hjl3q.jpg http://i48.tinypic.com/faucys.jpg http://i48.tinypic.com/2u4lhdd.png http://i49.tinypic.com/2updzl4.png http://i47.tinypic.com/2j0i4x4.jpg
note personal/clan/comparison scores were never started
now for the horrible code/download
http://www.mediafire.com/?13h3in1266klet7

item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

The design alone could come in handy, it’s amazing what people have lying around I’ll have a look through the code tonight and secure it up so people don’t have to worry about their databases being exploited, if that’s alright with you anyway.

this was made entirely by me (meaning, i downloaded everything individually, edited each webpage and added the php to include the different pages via $_get)

this php code is probably extremely horrible/vulnerable. i just wanted to do it in a single file, rather than multiple files like most highscores do.

notice the url and you’ll see how i did it (i probably should have done some sort of template system to include the requested page, but no. i used a million if statements)

now for the horrible code/download

MediaFire

RS New Site.rar

MediaFire is a simple to use free service that lets you put all your photos, documents, music, and video in a single place so you can access them anywhere and share them everywhere.
